General.Name: Hero Supermarket Tbk
General.Description: PT Hero Supermarket Tbk engages in the retail business primarily in Indonesia. The company operates through Food and Non-Food segments. It operates supermarket and specialty stores, including pharmacy, drugs stores, health and beauty stores, personal care, baby care, and home furnishing stores under the Hero Supermarket, Guardian, and IKEA brands. The company was incorporated in 1971 and is based in Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia. PT Hero Supermarket Tbk is a subsidiary of Mulgrave Corporation B.V.
General.Address: Graha HERO, 4th Floor, South Tangerang, Indonesia, 15224
